images.alt: Spreadsheet showing my bac garden rainfall records. Reads: 23-24 Nov, 2024. Storm Bert! 111mm

value.text: My rain gauge results are in - Storm Bert delivered 111mm to my back garden (Oxfordshire) in just 2 days. That's the biggest single rainfall event I've recorded in 4 years of keeping records, other than 2 months ago, when we got 141mm. Rainfall is changing very rapidly people. #TheLastDrop
